description: Our Standard rooms at Sea Side Resort are a comfortable and affordable option for those seeking a relaxing seaside getaway. With all the basic amenities you need for a comfortable stay, including a private bathroom, air conditioning, and a comfortable bed, these rooms offer great value for money. The decor is simple and elegant, with soft, neutral colors and classic furnishings. You can enjoy beautiful views of the sea or the gardens from your room, and take advantage of all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Superior rooms at Sea Side Resort offer a more spacious and luxurious option for those seeking a seaside retreat. These rooms are elegantly decorated with high-quality furnishings and beautiful fabrics, and feature a comfortable king-size bed and a private balcony or terrace with stunning sea views. The en-suite bathroom is well-appointed with high-quality fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and complimentary toiletries. Other amenities include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a mini fridge. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Deluxe rooms at Sea Side Resort are the epitome of seaside luxury. These spacious and beautifully appointed rooms feature high-end furnishings and luxurious amenities, including a comfortable king-size bed, a private balcony with sea views, and a luxurious en-suite bathroom with a jacuzzi and separate shower. The decor is elegant and sophisticated, with soft, muted colors and tasteful artwork. Other amenities include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a mini fridge. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Suites at Sea Side Resort are the ultimate seaside retreat. These luxurious and spacious rooms feature a separate living area with comfortable seating and a flat-screen TV, as well as a private bedroom with a king-size bed and a stunning sea view. The en-suite bathroom is beautifully appointed with high-end fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and a separate bathtub. Other amenities include air conditioning, a mini fridge, and a kitchenette with a microwave and sink. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Penthouse at Sea Side Resort is the most luxurious and spacious room in the resort, with stunning views of the sea from every angle. This two-story suite features a spacious living room with comfortable seating, a flat-screen TV, and a private balcony with breathtaking sea views. The upper floor features a master bedroom with a king-size bed and a private balcony, as well as a second bedroom with twin beds. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms with high-end fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and a separate bathtub. Other amenities include air conditioning, a mini fridge, and a kitchenette with a microwave and sink. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Ocean View Room at Sea Side Resort offers a stunning view of the ocean from the comfort of your bed. The room features a king-size bed, en-suite bathroom with high-end fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and a separate bathtub, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a mini fridge. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Garden View Suite at Sea Side Resort is a spacious and elegant room with a view of the resort's lush gardens. The suite features a king-size bed, en-suite bathroom with high-end fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and a separate bathtub, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a mini fridge. The room also has a separate seating area with a sofa bed, perfect for families or friends traveling together. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Beachfront Villa at Sea Side Resort is the ultimate in luxury and privacy. This spacious villa offers direct access to the beach and stunning views of the sea. The villa features two bedrooms, each with a king-size bed and en-suite bathroom with high-end fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and a separate bathtub. The villa also has a spacious living room with comfortable seating, a flat-screen TV, and a private terrace with outdoor seating and a private plunge pool. Other amenities include air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.

Our Family Suite at Sea Side Resort is perfect for families or groups traveling together. The suite features two separate bedrooms, one with a king-size bed and the other with twin beds, as well as a separate living room with a sofa bed. Each bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom with high-end fixtures and amenities, including a rain shower and a separate bathtub. Other amenities include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a mini fridge. You can enjoy access to all the resort's amenities, including the swimming pool, spa, and beach access. Complimentary breakfast is included.
